content.rendered:
Check out some of the ready-made events and challenges we have on offer!

Be inspired by the world’s greatest adventurers and entertained by top-class performers at our national and local events across the UK. And, if you’re up for a challenge—such as completing an epic cycling journey, or setting a personal best in a marathon—sign up to one of the fundraising adventures we organise every year.

Canary Wharf Rowathon, October 2022

Join us for the ultimate rowing challenge in association with St. James’s Place and proudly supported by the Canary Wharf Group.

London Adventure Walk, September 2022

Join us for the London Adventure Walk, a fun and different way of exploring our capital city.

TCS London Marathon, October 2022

Join Team Hope and run in the world famous TCS London Marathon!

Royal Parks Half Marathon, October 2022

Enjoy some of London’s most popular landmarks and beautiful parks while running the 13.1-mile Royal Parks Half Marathon.

Supporter Days, October 2022

Join us at one of our annual Supporter Days, taking place this year in Salisbury and York.

Prefer to organise your own event?

No problem. Check out our fundraising ideas or if you already know what you want to do tell us about it using the form below.  

Tell us about your event

MM slash DD slash YYYY
This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

.

excerpt.rendered: Want to get fit and do good at the same time? Find the fundraising event or challenge that’s right for you!
